item.title: Spark
item.author: xxxx
item.description: 导⼊pyspark.sql，创建spark session 1 2 3 4 5 from pyspark import SparkConf from pyspark.sql import SparkSession import pyspark.sql.functions as f from pyspark.sql.functions import array_contains spark = SparkSession.builder.config(conf=SparkConf()).getOrCreate() 读取 yelp_academic_dataset_business.json ⽂件，创建DataFrame 1 chushi = spark.read.json('file:///usr/local/src/yelp_academic_dataset_business.json') 分割数
